thread.section_title: Homestay.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homestay.com | homestay.com
thread.title: Bernadette Pickering

author: Bernadette Pickering
title: Bernadette Pickering
text:
Barbara and her husband made me feel like I was in a home from home, even though it was only a one night stay. They were so accommodating and have a beautiful home. My room was delightful, airy and comfortable. In the morning the table was laid with a generous breakfast with lots of choice.
I would highly recommend this home and would definitely return in the future when necessary.
Stayed 15th Feb '17
